column2: For years we have labored under Turkish rule. Now, our people strong and our will iron, we will rise as the Steppe Wolfe once again!
The Turks in our nation are a leftover from Ottoman control. In order to shake the legacy of oppression, we must solve this problem. Permanently.
Bulgarians living abroad in Greece and Serbia must now come home, since the Turkish stench has been removed.
We have a historical claim to Thrace and Tsargrad, it is time to make the international community accept those claims.
The Turks are being removed from our country and their women taken. This is cause for celebration!
Our Bulgarian brothers living in Greece and Serbia are returning home at long last.
